com.continuent.tungsten.replicator.event
Class ReplOption

java.lang.Object
  com.continuent.tungsten.replicator.event.ReplOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ReplOption
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class stores generic name/value pairs in an easily serializable format. It provides an standard way to represent metadata and session variables.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Stephane Giron
